title: Roni Ribeiro
text: Roni da Silva Ribeiro (born 30 June 1980 in <a href="Brazil">Brazil</a>) is a <a href="Brazilian%20people">Brazilian</a> <a href="association%20football">football</a> (<a href="Midfielder%20%28association%20football%29">midfielder</a>) player who currently plays for SG Neudorf/Parndorf.
